Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the resource name. For example:

{ "Ref": "vpc-cni" }

For the add-on vpc-cni, Ref returns the name of the add-on. For example, cluster-name|vpc-cni.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The ARN of the add-on, such as arn:aws:eks:us-west-2:111122223333:addon/1-19/vpc-cni/xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx.
